website_summaries.verdict: This live center receives few criticisms. Owners appreciate the quality of the steel and the 60-degree points it can achieve.
pros: the live center has a washer built in to shield bearings from grime

customer_reviews.title: Turns smoothly no play
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1978 Craftsman wood lathe it takes a MT 1 . It fills well made, bearings turn smoothly no play. The chart on the box shows 5000 rpm max. I chose this live center because it has three bearings not one . Other live center for wood lathes in this price range I looked at had complaints of sloppy bearings and falling apart .
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Works, but for how long.
customer_reviews.text: Ring around the live center began to come out within the first use. Does not seem well made, and does not appear to be of quality to last very long....
customer_reviews.author: FlawlessJS

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an old Craftsman 12-inch lathe new it was not the right size but could not find a replacement I replaced the tail spindle with a home made one and so far it is working.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Used to use a dead center
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than that. No friction, no heat, smooth rotation. Great unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the live center on my 1972 craftsman lathe. The product fit perfect and I have had 0 issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Live Center
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I use mine in an old late 50’s/early 60’s Craftsman monotube lathe. The live center is a little large, so you lose about 1 1/2” of working length, but it’s smooth and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase, For the price you wont find anything better. Solid construction, helped turn my cheap lathe into a usable tool.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Does everything you would want
customer_reviews.text: I find no slack, no wobble, and now no burning into the wood as I do my work. It is all I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: TCB

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this live center
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this live center. High quality and precise. I put this on a wood lathe I refurbished and its turns like butter. The shipping was also only 2 days. Great seller. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas DriscollTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Excellent live center for lathe
customer_reviews.text: I used this to replace the original live center that came with my Craftsman lathe. This center is much easier to use than the original one.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Funk

customer_reviews.title: A heavy, well constructed live center at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: A great live center that has yet to not be true. A heavy, well constructed live center at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great center smooth and true wooks great on my old atlas . would buy again if need ever arises
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and fits as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and fits as advertised. Perfect for my old mini lathe
customer_reviews.author: Jerome D Gaber

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if they just had bad luck or I got a good one but
customer_reviews.text: I have used this on my vintage craftsman lathe. I read other post knocking it. I don't know if they just had bad luck or I got a good one but, mine works great! For the money this was is an awesome deal!
customer_reviews.author: Oakman404

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with a great price
customer_reviews.text: This product is definitely worth buying. Excellent product with a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Morse Taper
customer_reviews.text: To date, this "live center" Morse Taper has performed as advertised. I don't use the lathe a lot - that's why I purchased this Morse Taper.
customer_reviews.author: WFS

customer_reviews.title: live center
customer_reviews.text: Basic live center great low price, smooth feeling, nice finish on the morse taper.I am only using these in my lathe to check true of shafts.not using them in a high speed turning application.
customer_reviews.author: kawasaki

customer_reviews.title: quality live tail.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about buying this product sight unseen but it has turned out to be a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Clark

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Morse taper is not accurate enough for precision work.
customer_reviews.author: P.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, and fits on my lathe. Thanks Lathe Centers!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Greiner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and well engineered product
customer_reviews.text: excellent product for the price. Well engineered.Durability will be tested with time and use........extremely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Charles Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Center
customer_reviews.text: Arived fast. Better built Than I expected I am going to have to re taper it to a o mt before I can test it.
customer_reviews.author: ward

customer_reviews.title: This works great
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it a huge amount but so far i am loving this thing
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly, and I was surprised by the quality. Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: jefft8

product_meta.title: LC-11 1 Morse Taper Medium Duty Live Center
product_meta.description: Made of finest heat treated steel, with case-hardened housing. Built-in washer to protect bearings from grit and dust. Centers have 60 degree point, and concentricity of +/-0.0004'.Size: 1 Morse TaperCenters have 60 degree point, and concentricity of +/-0.0004'
feature_bullets: High quality triple bearing design (bearings are immersed & sealed). Made of precision ground hardened steel for high accuracy.
0.0002" Concentricity; 5000 Max RPM; 600 lbs. max workpiece weight; 2-28 NF Drawbar Thread; Hardened to 61-65 Rockwell Great for high speed turning, CNC work

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars61 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
